title: Should I play with mouse or mousepad?
body:
I've been playing League of Legends ever since Super Galaxy Rumble came out.
And since then, i didn't had a mouse. I played with my mousepad on my MacBook.
I found a mouse in our garage on Sunday and I found that a huge majority of people play with mouse.
I find that i play {{champion:150}} really great without mousepad, maining him is fun too.
Many of my irl Plat friends saw how i play and they told me "You deserve to be at least to Silver, play with a mouse and you'll be in Silver or at least in Gold in no time"
I tried playing with Mouse today and it didnt seem to work out for me, i did bad.
Should i keep practicing with my mouse and see how well i do or just stick with my the mousepad?

replies.body: Play with the eraser mouse in the middle of your laptop keyboard.  MUCH better than mouse or trackpad.
You should play with your mouse ON your touchpad, and begin the excruciating climb to Diamond. Step 2's just not as worth without Step 1.
It is known as a trackpad to avoid confusion but yes learn a mouse. Please do not play with a trackpad.
